attributes.action: Regulate the role of Funeral Directors
attributes.background:
There are currently no regulations in place 
governing how loved ones are cared for by Funeral Directors after they die. Regulation ensures that high quality care is provided, professional standards and codes of practices met and people are properly trained and accountable in this profession.
